Code Snippets

A collection of useful code snippets, utilities, and solutions to common programming challenges.

Utility Functions

JavaScript 
// Deep clone an object
const deepClone = (obj) => {
  return JSON.parse(
    JSON.stringify(obj)
  );
};

// Format currency
const formatCurrency = (
  amount,
  currency = 'USD'
) => {
  return new Intl.NumberFormat(
    'en-US',
    {
      style: 'currency',
      currency
    }
  ).format(amount);
};
View Gist

React Custom Hook

TypeScript 
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

const useLocalStorage = (
  key: string,
  initialValue: T
): [T, (value: T) => void] => {
  const [storedValue, setStoredValue] = 
    useState(() => {
    try {
      const item = window.localStorage
        .getItem(key);
      return item ? JSON.parse(item) 
        : initialValue;
    } catch (error) {
      return initialValue;
    }
  });

  useEffect(() => {
    window.localStorage.setItem(
      key,
      JSON.stringify(storedValue)
    );
  }, [key, storedValue]);

  return [storedValue, setStoredValue];
};
View Gist

API Error Handler

Python 
from functools import wraps
from typing import Callable, Any

def handle_api_errors(
    func: Callable[..., Any]
) -> Callable[..., Any]:
    @wraps(func)
    async def wrapper(*args, **kwargs):
        try:
            return await func(*args, **kwargs)
        except Exception as e:
            return {
                'error': str(e),
                'status': 500
            }
    return wrapper

@handle_api_errors
async def fetch_data():
    # Your API logic here
    pass
